## Catalog Description

Semester course; 3 lecture hours. 3 credits. Prerequisite: CMSC 401 with a minimum grade of C. This course provides introduction and basic concepts of computer security, cyber attacks, cyber defense, cyber forensics and cyber ethics.


## Restrictions including pre- or co-requisities
 
CMSC 401 with a minimum grade of C.

## Description

This course provides introduction and basic concepts of computer security, cyber attacks, cyber defense, cyber forensics and cyber ethics.

## Topics

cyber defense, cyber ethics, cyber forensics, cybersecurity, security
